questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

Drag and drop the Cisco Secure Email Gateway benefits from the left to the corresponding deployment options on the right.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Cloud:
Lowers the cost of deploying in highly distributed networks
Highest levels of service availability
(Cloud providers offer built-in redundancy and high availability across multiple data centers.)
Virtual:
Highest levels of data protection
(Virtual solutions are often deployed on-premises, enabling tighter control over data.)
Respond instantly to increasing traffic growth
(Virtual solutions can scale within an organization’s existing infrastructure.)

Cloud: 
- Dedicated email security deployments in multiple resilient Cisco data centers provide the highest levels of service availability and data protection.

Virtual:
-virtual appliances significantly lowers the cost of deploying email security, especially in highly distributed networks.
-respond instantly to increasing traffic growth with simplified capacity planning.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/security/cloud-email-security/datasheet-c78-742868.html

As we see in the relevant Cisco documentation, the correct answer is the exact opposite of the provided one.
Cloud
-------------------------
-High level of availability and protection
Virtual
-----------------------
-lowers the cost of deploying email security, especially in highly distributed networks
-respond instantly to increasing traffic growth

comments.content: WHO IS DRILLING HOLES IN THE CANOE? WE WILL FIND THEM OUT :)
Which begs the question - where did the incorrect provided answer come from ?

discussion.content:
Virtual Appliance

The Cisco Email Security Virtual Appliance significantly lowers the cost of deploying email security, especially in highly distributed networks. This appliance lets your network manager create instances where and when they are needed, using your existing network infrastructure. A software version of the physical appliance, it runs on top of a VMware ESXi hypervisor and Cisco Unified Computing System™ (Cisco UCS®) servers. You receive an unlimited license for the virtual appliance with the purchase of any Cisco Email Security software bundle.

With the virtual appliance, you can respond instantly to increasing traffic growth with simplified capacity planning. You don’t need to buy and ship appliances, so you can support new business opportunities without adding complexity to a data center or having to hire additional staff.

choices.B: increased data volumes and value in data center storage
choices.A: minimal endpoint-based security manual configuration and implementation
choices.C: increased number of BYOD policies and hybrid remote worker
choices.D: stricter control mechanism requirements for enterprise access

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
I'd say it's indeed C.

questions.question_text: What has driven an increase in the need for endpoint-based security?
A security test performed on one of the applications shows that user input is not validated. Which security vulnerability is the application more susceptible to because of this lack of validation?
Which problem is solved by deploying a multicontext firewall?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
im going with C
SCD cannot quarantine a file, it can only allow, block and monitor. In this case the answer is A ACD (Advance custom detection).

comments.content:
Correct C
This document describes the steps to create a Simple Custom Detection list to detect, block and quarantine specific files

with wimple should work

comments.content: Please avoid leaving a comment with a weak answer.

discussion.content: I'm not sure. Either A or C, for sure NOT D.

Selected Answer: A
I believe this is A.

comments.content: Belief against facts. Please, read through some corresponding Cisco documents before leaving an answer. It is actually C. (see why in the previous comment)

choices.B: Add a network IP block allowed list to the configuration and add the blocked files.
choices.C: Use the simple custom detection feature and add each detection to the list.
choices.D: Configure an application control allowed applications list to block the files.
choices.A: Create an advanced custom detection and upload the hash of each file.

questions.question_text: What must be configured on Cisco Secure Endpoint to create a custom detection file list to detect and quarantine future files?
